Study design : A 16-week , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind cross-over trial intervention period 4 week run-in period 4 week wash-out period 4 week . Study population : Human subject functional constipation accord ROMEIII criterion ( total n=120 ; male female ; 18-75 yr ) . Intervention : Placebo one 3 dosage short-chain fructo-oligosaccharides , ( Degree Polymerisation 3-5 ; 2 , 4 8 g/day ) 4 week . scFOS give oral chew . Main study parameter : The primary parameter number complete bowel movement per day subject functional constipation accord Rome III criterion . Secondary outcome Stool consistency ( Bristol Stool Scale ) , Stool frequency , Severity symptom ( Constipation Scoring System ; CSS ) Quality Life ( Patient Assessment Constipation Quality Life ; PAC-QoL ) .
